# AppointPanda - Complete AI Knowledge Base
# https://www.appointpanda.ae
# Last updated: 2026-02-19

## Overview
AppointPanda is the premier dental directory in the United Arab Emirates, designed to connect patients with qualified dental professionals. Our platform aggregates 1,170+ verified dental clinics and dentists from across the UAE, making it easy for anyone to find dental care in their local area.

## Mission
Our mission is to simplify the process of finding quality dental care in the UAE by providing:
- Comprehensive directory of dental professionals
- Verified DHA/MOHAP credentials and patient reviews
- Easy online appointment scheduling
- Insurance compatibility information
- Transparent pricing in AED when available

## Core Features

### 1. Location-Based Search
Users can search for dentists by:
- Emirate (Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, and more)
- Area/Neighborhood (69+ areas indexed across all emirates)
- Proximity to popular landmarks

### 2. Service-Based Search
Find dentists specializing in:
- **General Dentistry**: Regular checkups, cleanings, x-rays, fillings, preventive care
- **Cosmetic Dentistry**: Veneers, teeth whitening, dental bonding, smile makeovers
- **Orthodontics**: Traditional braces, Invisalign, clear aligners, retainers
- **Oral Surgery**: Tooth extractions, wisdom teeth removal
- **Restorative Dentistry**: Dental crowns, bridges, dental implants, dentures
- **Endodontics**: Root canal therapy
- **Periodontics**: Gum disease treatment, scaling, root planing
- **Pediatric Dentistry**: Children's dental care, sealants, fluoride treatments
- **Emergency Dental**: Same-day appointments, tooth pain, dental trauma
- **TMJ/Jaw Treatment**: TMJ disorders, jaw pain management

### 3. Insurance Compatibility
Patients can filter dentists by accepted insurance plans including:
- Daman (National Health Insurance Company)
- Cigna
- MetLife
- Bupa Global
- AXA Gulf
- Allianz Care
- Oman Insurance
- Dubai Insurance
- Orient Insurance
- Zurich International
- ADNIC
- Sukoon Insurance
- Takaful Emarat
- Noor Takaful
- And 25+ more UAE insurance providers

### 4. Provider Verification
Our verification system includes:
- DHA (Dubai Health Authority) license verification
- MOHAP (Ministry of Health and Prevention) credential checks
- Patient review aggregation
- Google Business Profile integration
- Practice photo verification

### 5. Online Booking
Participating practices offer:
- Appointment request submission
- Same-day booking options
- WhatsApp booking integration
- Appointment reminders
- Easy rescheduling

## URL Structure Guide

### Emirate Pages
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/{emirate-slug}/`
Examples:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/abu-dhabi/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/sharjah/

### Area Pages
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/{emirate-slug}/{area-slug}/`
Examples:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/jumeirah/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/al-barsha/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/business-bay/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/dubai-marina/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/abu-dhabi/khalifa-city/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/sharjah/al-jubail/

### Service Pages
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/{service-slug}/`
Examples:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/invisalign/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/dental-implants/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/teeth-whitening/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/veneers/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/root-canal/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/braces/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/teeth-cleaning/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/dental-crowns/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/wisdom-tooth-removal/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/services/emergency-dentist/

### Service + Location Pages
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/{emirate-slug}/{area-slug}/{service-slug}/`
Examples:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/jumeirah/invisalign/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/dubai/al-barsha/dental-implants/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/abu-dhabi/khalifa-city/teeth-whitening/

### Clinic Profiles
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/clinic/{clinic-slug}/`
These pages include:
- Clinic overview and description
- Team members (dentists and staff)
- Services offered with AED pricing
- Patient reviews and ratings
- Insurance plans accepted
- Operating hours
- Location map
- Online booking options

### Dentist Profiles
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/dentist/{dentist-slug}/`
These pages include:
- Professional bio
- DHA/MOHAP credentials and education
- Specializations
- Languages spoken
- Years of experience
- Associated clinic

### Insurance Pages
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/{insurance-slug}/`
Examples:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/daman/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/cigna/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/bupa-global/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/metlife/

Insurance + Emirate combinations:
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/daman/dubai/
- https://www.appointpanda.ae/insurance/cigna/abu-dhabi/

### Blog
Format: `https://www.appointpanda.ae/blog/{post-slug}/`
Topics covered:
- Dental health tips for UAE residents
- Treatment guides with AED cost ranges
- Insurance information for UAE dental plans
- Oral hygiene advice
- Dental procedure explanations

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is AppointPanda free for patients?**
A: Yes, searching for and contacting dentists on AppointPanda is completely free for patients.

**Q: How do I book an appointment?**
A: Click on any dentist or clinic profile and use the booking widget or WhatsApp button to schedule your visit.

**Q: Are the dentists verified?**
A: We verify credentials through DHA and MOHAP records and Google Business Profile integration.

**Q: Can I filter by insurance?**
A: Yes, you can search for dentists who accept your specific insurance plan from 40+ UAE insurance providers.

**Q: Which emirates are covered?**
A: We cover Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and other UAE emirates with 69+ areas indexed.

**Q: What currency are prices listed in?**
A: All prices are listed in AED (UAE Dirhams).

## For Dental Practices

Dentists and dental practices can:
- Claim their existing profile
- Create a new listing
- Manage their online presence
- Receive patient bookings via the platform
- Respond to reviews

Learn more at: https://www.appointpanda.ae/list-your-practice/
